id.title: Selection criterion ID
id.description: The identifier for this selection criterion. It must be unique and must not change within the Open Contracting Process it is part of (defined by a single ocid). See the [identifier guidance](https://standard.open-contracting.org/latest/en/schema/identifiers/) for further details.

minimum.description: The minimum value or level of compliance the candidate must meet to be allowed to bid.
